document.forum_title: Latest World News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: B100,000 reward for info on Surat Thani bombing suspects
document.topic_text: B100,000 reward for info on Surat Thani bombing suspects Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 32 minutes ago ) Surat Thani police have have offered a 100,000 baht reward for information about the movements and appearance of four unidentified suspects believed responsible for the arson and bombings in the city on Aug 12. Authorities have released CCTV images of two men suspected of bombing at least at one place in Surat Thani during the attacks that shook seven southern provinces...
